Client.Name: Guangdong Heavy Industry Architectural Design Institute Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Guangdong Heavy Industry Architectural Design Institute Co., Ltd. was restructured from the former Guangdong Fuel Industry Design Institute, established in 1959. Following its acquisition by Poly Development Holding Group Co., Ltd. and Guangdong Guangye Inspection and Testing Group Co., Ltd. in 2008, it was renamed. The institute is a comprehensive Class A design institute featuring comprehensive professional divisions, robust technical capabilities, extensive design experience, and excellent service standards. As of 2023, the company employs over 2,000 staff members. Headquartered in Guangzhou Science City, it operates two wholly-owned subsidiaries: Heavy Industry Supervision and Heavy Industry Technical Consulting. The company boasts over 460 registered professionals in architecture, structural engineering, public utilities, geotechnical engineering, and other disciplines, along with over 1,400 personnel holding master's, doctoral, or key undergraduate degrees. It also hosts a Guangdong Provincial Doctoral Workstation.

The company specializes in four core business segments: design, geotechnical engineering, supervision, and consulting. Its services span all phases and aspects of engineering construction projects, including planning, design, consulting, investigation, monitoring and surveying, supervision, and construction drawing review, delivering comprehensive, one-stop, full-process services from project initiation to handover. Projects span real estate, rail transit, public buildings, environmental protection, and industrial construction. Through years of development, the company has established a business network centered in Guangzhou, focused on Guangdong Province, and extending nationwide. Operations cover 42+ cities across 22 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions including Guangdong, Sichuan, Hunan, Hubei, Fujian, Hainan, Jiangsu, and Zhejiang, as well as select overseas cities.

The company places high importance on technological innovation, having accumulated a total of 409 patents, including 21 invention patents, 279 utility model patents, and 1 design patent. It holds 108 software copyrights and has participated in the compilation and publication of 56 standards. Its scientific and technological achievements have received domestic advanced or higher recognition in 45 cases, including 7 internationally leading, 12 internationally advanced, 18 domestically leading, and 8 domestically advanced.
